name: Pong (itch) (GalactiCorpz)
description:
Pong is one of the earliest arcade video games. It is a table tennis sports game featuring simple two-dimensional graphics. The game was originally manufactured by Atari, which released it in 1972. Allan Alcorn created Pong as a training exercise assigned to him by Atari co-founder Nolan Bushnell. ~ Wikipedia

A remade classic for everyone to enjoy! 

Created in one hour using Unity.
